original_text: Then the angel of the Lord went forth, and smote in the camp of the Assyrians a hundred and fourscore and five thousand: and when they arose early in the morning, behold, they were all dead corpses.
korean_text: 여호와의 사자가 나가서 앗수르 진중에서 십팔만 오천인을 쳤으므로 아침에 일찍이 일어나 본즉 시체뿐이라

sentences.original_text: Then the angel of the Lord went forth
and smote in the camp of the Assyrians
a hundred and fourscore and five thousand
And when they arose early in the morning
behold, they were all dead corpses
